input.name: start
input.description:
One-based index at which to begin extraction.
A negative index can be used, indicating an offset from the end of the list.
Defaults to `1` (first element in the list).

input.name: end
input.description:
One-based index at which to end extraction.
A negative index can be used, indicating an offset from the end of the list.
Defaults to `-1` (the last element in the list).

input.name: limit
input.description:
A positive integer specifying a limit on the number of elements to be extracted.
Defaults to `null` (no limit).
